thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com
thread.title: Maggy Collins

author: Maggy Collins
title: Maggy Collins
text:
Found the desk staff to be very helpful and friendly, especially when coming off a flight, your brain's a bit fuzzy (well mine usually is). Bit of a drag trying to find the car in the huge car park but that's more down to the user than the company!
Very good directions at Shannon Airport to the return base and again the staff very friendly and really helpful, able to refund fuel etc within minutes saving delays etc. Transfer guy was lovely and helpful.
